title: ProdStarterHub Template Metadata Schema
description: Schema describing metadata for a ProdStarterHub starter template. Used both by per-template `template.json` files and by entries in `core/templates-registry.json`.

id.description: Unique template identifier, kebab-case. Should match the folder name, e.g. `nextjs-saas-typescript`.

type.description: High-level category of the template: web app, API backend, service/microservice, or CLI tool.

language.description: Primary implementation language of the template.

framework.description: Primary framework, runtime, or technology, e.g. `Next.js`, `FastAPI`, `Django REST Framework`, `Laravel`, `Rails`, `Spring Boot`, `ASP.NET Core`, `chi`, `gRPC`.

path.description: Relative path from the repository root to the template directory, e.g. `templates/web/nextjs-saas-typescript`. Required in `templates-registry.json`, optional in per-template `template.json`.

description.description: Short description of what this template is and when to use it.

features.description: Key features provided by this template: technology, capabilities, integrations.

recommendedFor.description: Typical use cases or domains this template is recommended for, e.g. `saas`, `marketplaces`, `microservices`, `cli-tools`.

tags.description: Additional free-form tags to help categorize or filter templates.

complexity.description: Approximate complexity level of the template.

status.description: Lifecycle status of the template within ProdStarterHub.

minCliVersion.description: Minimum ProdStarterHub CLI version required to use this template, in semver format (e.g. `0.1.0`).

runtime.description: Optional runtime requirements specific to this template.

node.description: Node.js version range if the template depends on Node tooling (e.g. for web/JS templates).

docs.description: Relative paths to documentation files that should exist in the template directory.

readme.description: Path to the main README for the template, default `README.md`.

tutorial.description: Path to the step-by-step tutorial, default `TUTORIAL.md`.

architecture.description: Path to the architecture overview, default `ARCHITECTURE.md`.

tasks.description: Path to the practice tasks file, default `TASKS.md`.

docker.description: Information about Docker support for this template.

enabled.description: Whether Docker support is included in this template.

composeFile.description: Relative path to a `docker-compose` file if present.

dockerfile.description: Relative path to the main `Dockerfile` if present.

scaffolding.description: Optional hints for the CLI about how to scaffold this template.

supportsNonInteractive.description: Whether this template can be fully configured non-interactively via CLI flags.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when this template was originally added.

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when this template definition was last updated.

maintainers.description: Optional list of maintainers responsible for this template.

github.description: GitHub username of the maintainer, without the '@'.
